Windlord::

"will be a pleasurehelp you, my friend ?" shouted Windlord an f=
ired 25 times against Train Wreck
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: S=
oulstice Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001=
 9:41 PM
  Subject: Re: War at Chivtron's Base!!!


  Deemos looks up in sh=
ock as the 8 blasts rain down upon him. He was hit by
  every one of them. =
He cringes and shudders.

  Deemos: You coward, you fire at me? You dare fi=
re at me when we were having
  close combat? You lowly coward!

  Deemos st=
epped backwards, then turned and ran for a rock, meaning to use it
  as his=
 shield from future blasts...

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: <Rudr=
a656@...>
  To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
  Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 =
10:30 PM
  Subject: Re: War at Chivtron's Base!!!


  > ::Aerotaur::
  >   =
  He stiffened at the voice behind him.  But only for an instant.  He
  the=
n
  > shot up higher into the sky.  The blast catches his left knee blowing=
 his
  > lower leg off.  He howls in pain.  "WINDLORD!  TAKE HIM OUT!"  He =
flies
  > higher unable to land.  Mech fluid gushes from his leg.  He opens=
 another
  > eight shot barrage at Deemos.
